mapper.insert: insert into task(user_id, topic, message, message_id, state, create_time, update_time) values (#{userId}, #{topic}, #{message}, #{messageId}, #{state}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update task set state = 'complete' where user_id = #{userId} and message_id = #{messageId}
update task set state = 'fail' where user_id = #{userId} and message_id = #{messageId}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, topic, message, message_id, state, create_time, update_time from task where state = 'fail' or (state = 'create' and now() - update_time > 6)
